sentences.sentence: Two chose not to vilify Skilling, however.
sentences.translation: 然而，也有两个人并不愿诋毁思斯奇林。

sentences.sentence: "A libel tending to asperse or vilify the house of Commons" (Letters of Junius).
sentences.translation: “倾向于诋毁、中伤众议院的诽谤言论”(米尼·厄斯的信件)。

sentences.sentence: And yet he has found a way to think kindly of those who oppress his people and vilify his name.
sentences.translation: 但他已找到一种方法，认为这些善意谁压迫他的人民和丑化他的名字。
